org.apache.iotdb.tsfile.encoding.decoder

Class BitmapDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.iotdb.tsfile.encoding.decoder.Decoder
      • org.apache.iotdb.tsfile.encoding.decoder.BitmapDecoder
  • Deprecated. 
    (2019.1.25, The bitmap data type has been removed., We can reserve this class, and reuse it later.)

    @Deprecated
public class BitmapDecoder
extends Decoder
    Decoder switch or enums value using bitmap, bitmap-encoding:. <length> <num> <encoded-data>
